articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Kristen Holmes
articles.title: How the White House orchestrated Trump’s Oval Office ambush of South African president - CNN
articles.description: Moments before President Donald Trump escorted his South African counterpart into the Oval Office on Wednesday, White House aides could be seen wheeling two large-screen televisions down the driveway and into the West Wing.
articles.content: Moments before President Donald Trump escorted his South African counterpart into the Oval Office on Wednesday, White House aides could be seen wheeling two large-screen televisions down the driveway… [+5745 chars]
